headline: Mettler-Toledo price target raised to $1,260 from $1,200 at BofA
summary: BofA raised the firm’s price target on Mettler-Toledo (MTD) to $1,260 from $1,200 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm is updating its price targets for stocks under its coverage in the Life Sciences & Diagnostic Tools, LSTs, sector, the analyst tells investors. The firm notes LSTs remain under pressure as uncertainty persists with the macro environment and U.S. government policies.
